DataElement.preferredName: Head and Neck Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma Clinical M CPTAC Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the distant metastasis for head and neck cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma based on clinical stage information obtained from the date of cancer diagnosis until the start of definitive treatment, or within four months (whichever is shorter).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Head and Neck Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma Clinical Distant Metastasis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: For oncology, an area of the body generally construed to comprise the base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas._A clinical finding about one or more characteristics of cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: For oncology, area of the body generally construed to comprise base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

Concepts.definition: For oncology, an area of the body generally construed to comprise the base of skull and facial bones, sinuses, orbits, salivary glands, oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx, thyroid, facial and neck musculature and lymph nodes draining these areas.

Property.preferredName: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck Clinical Distant Metastasis TNM Finding v8
Property.preferredDefinition: A clinical finding about one or more characteristics of cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases.

Concepts.longName: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck Clinical Distant Metastasis TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: A clinical finding about one or more characteristics of cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/2/21 jk upd to use C12418 as OC for consistency with NCI Std TNM.  6/16/21 jk upd to use CPTAC specific CUI for property. 4/22/21 jk created for CPTAC HNSCC Baseline CRF - generalized AJCC level.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A clinical finding about one or more characteristics of cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system as they pertain to distant metastases._A national effort to accelerate the understanding of the molecular basis of cancer through the application of large-scale proteome and genome analysis, or proteogenomics._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A lack of clinical and/or pathology information to assign a cM stage conclusively.

Concepts.definition: A lack of clinical and/or pathology information to assign a cM stage conclusively.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck cM0 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck cM0 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck without evidence of distant metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck cM0 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck without evidence of distant metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck cM1 TNM Finding v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck cM1 TNM Finding v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck with distant metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Cutaneous Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck cM1 TNM Finding v8
Concepts.definition: Cutaneous squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck with distant metastasis. (from AJCC 8th Ed.)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.
